thread.section_title: The Premier New York Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Being Objective
thread.title_full: Being Objective - Review of The Premier New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dominicanamerican
title: Being Objective
text:
I have stayed in several hotels in NY so I can compare to my other experiences.
Pros of this hotel-Location is a big plus if you want to be around Times Square an go to the theater.
Evening cocktail also a nice plus which is not common among other NYC hotels.
Rooms are large and comfortable with a nice view.
Cons of this hotel-For the price breakfast should have more variety. Items such as scrambled eggs are not served.
Revolving door in the entrance trapped trash from the wind. Not a big deal but easy to fix and make reception more inviting.
Room Tip: Corner room See more room tips
